entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
..TORNADO WATCH 320 IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, TORNADOES, AND HEAVY RAINFALL, THEN SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
